title: "AI ‘euphoria’ and EV bets drive South Korea market rally"
excerpt: "Local investors are buying shares of companies that are part of the EV supply chain. Korean battery producers and manufacturers are expected to benefit from the rapid expansion of the global EV market and the US Inflation Reduction Act, which is aimed at curbing China’s control of the green energy sector."
